sentences.en: Dyke released the levers, reaching for his revolver.
sentences.cn: 戴克放掉操纵杆, 伸手去拿左轮枪.

sentences.en: He dashed in with a revolver in his hand.
sentences.cn: 他提着一把枪飞快地冲进来.

sentences.en: He went to the door and, hammering with a revolver, demanded drink.
sentences.cn: 他来到门口, 一面用枪托猛敲店门, 一面吆喝着要喝酒.

sentences.en: I've got a revolver there which he can have.
sentences.cn: 那有一支左轮就给他用.

sentences.en: The cold sharp nose of the revolver suddenly punched her neck.
sentences.cn: 这时冰冷的枪口突然触到她的头颈上.

sentences.en: The informer said that one of the gang would have a revolver.
sentences.cn: 通报者透露匪徒中有一人手中有枪.

sentences.en: The man smuggled a revolver into the prison.
sentences.cn: 那个男人把一支左轮枪偷偷带进监狱.

sentences.en: The man with the beard replaced his revolver.
sentences.cn: 有胡子的人又把左轮枪收了起来.

sentences.en: The rear of the revolver has two fluorescent spots for night firing.
sentences.cn: 照门上有用于夜间射击的荧光点.

sentences.en: The revolver was loaded with only one bullet.
sentences.cn: 这支左轮手枪仅上了一颗子弹。

sentences.en: The revolver with built - in titanium firing pin, it can use the gun rope.
sentences.cn: 该枪采用 内置式 钛合金击针, 可安装枪纲.

words.tran_cn: 革命的；旋转的；大变革的
旋转（revolve的过去式，过去分词）
旋转；循环出现；反复考虑
使…旋转；使…循环；反复考虑

trans.tran_cn: 左轮手枪，旋转者，旋转式装置，[冶]转炉
trans.tran_en: a type of small gun. The bullets are in a case which turns around as you fire the gun, so that when you fire one bullet the next bullet is ready to be fired.
